text:
@JoeBiden This is to all that don't want to wear a mask!!
I'm pretty sure you have seen a dirty filter in a vehicle or an air conditioning unit. Than is the same thing except, wait for it! It protects you from getting Covid-19 & it will prevent you from spreading it to others & bad breath https://t.co/9xdwQRdzKZ
